positive_examples: This is an example of norepinephrine.
We observed norepinephrine in this context.
A typical case of norepinephrine would involve these features.
The concept of norepinephrine applies here.
A catecholamine neurotransmitter involved in arousal, alertness, and the fight-or-flight response.
negative_examples: This is an example of dopamine, not norepinephrine.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Dopamine, or other types of Neurotransmitter

definition: A neurotransmitter and hormone involved in the fight-or-flight response.
